price: ហើយពួកគេផ្ដល់ចំណីអាហារដែលពួកគេចូលចិត្ដដល់ជន ក្រីក្រ និងកូនកំព្រា ហើយនិងឈ្លើយសឹក។
arabic: وَيُطۡعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسۡكِينٗا وَيَتِيمٗا وَأَسِيرًا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wayuṭ'ʿimūna al-ṭaʿāma ʿalā ḥubbihi mis'kīnan wayatīman wa-asīran
